description: This code was used to create dataset 27087 "Assembled ecosystem measures from grassland EPs (2008-2018) for multifunctionality synthesis - June 2020" (currently under embargo). Synthesis (core) project of the Biodiversity Exploratories.

title: Code to create Assembled ecosystem measures from grassland EPs (2008-2018) for multifunctionality synthesis - June 2020
